name: Screams of the Deep
description:
A two player game. One player is a diver trying to escape an underwater cavern with only their wits and their trusty sonar gun. The other player guides them with a journal containing all the secrets of the cold, watery depths.

Communicate with only your voice.

Can you find your way out together?

Explorer Journal is mandatory.

Explorer Journal is mandatory.

Explorer Journal is mandatory.

Explorer Journal is mandatory.

Explorer Journal is mandatory.

The journal is NOT LORE. It is a REQUIRED gameplay element.

There is currently a 10:1 ratio of people who are  only downloading  the executable then being confused and frustrated. The journal is a critical part of the game's design. If you're wandering around the caverns  on your own, then you're missing out on a key part of the game's experience!
